{{cpp/ranges/stride_view/iterator/title|''iterator''}}
{{cpp/ranges/stride_view/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++23|1=
/*iterator*/()
    requires std::default_initializable&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;&gt; = default;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++23|1=
constexpr /*iterator*/( /*iterator*/&lt;!Const&gt; i )
    requires Const and
        std::convertible_to&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt;, ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;&gt; and
        std::convertible_to&lt;ranges::sentinel_t&lt;V&gt;, ranges::sentinel_t&lt;Base&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=3|notes={{mark expos}}|1=
private:
constexpr /*iterator*/( /*Parent*/&amp; parent,
                        ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt; current,
                        ranges::range_difference_t&lt;Base&gt; missing = 0 );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Constructs an {{rlp|/|iterator}}.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value initialization|Value-initializes]]:
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} with {{c|ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;()}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|end_}} with {{c|ranges::sentinel_t&lt;Base&gt;()}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|stride_}} with {{c|0}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|missing_}} with {{c|0}}.

@2@ Conversion from {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;false&gt;}} to {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;true&gt;}}. Initializes:
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} with {{c|std::move(i.current_)}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|end_}} with {{c|std::move(i.end_)}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|stride_}} with {{c|i.stride_}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|missing_}} with {{c|i.missing_}}.

@3@ A private constructor which is used by {{lc|stride_view::begin}} and {{lc|stride_view::end}}. This constructor is not accessible to users. Initializes
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} with {{c|std::move(current)}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|end_}} with {{c|ranges::end(parent-&gt;base_)}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|stride_}} with {{c|parent-&gt;stride_}},
* {{rlpi|/#Data members|missing_}} with {{c|missing}}.
